explains: adj. 无法忍受的；偏狭的

sentences.en: Why would anyone want to be labeled intolerant?
sentences.cn: 为什么有人想被贴上不宽容的标签呢？

sentences.en: There are many explanations for intolerant attitudes, some dating back to childhood.
sentences.cn: 对于不宽容的态度有很多解释，有些可以追溯到童年时代。

sentences.en: It is, of course, possible to disagree with an opinion without being intolerant of it.
sentences.cn: 当然，也有可能不同意某一观点而又容忍它。
